comments.author: Gash
comments.body: I have this idea swirling in the top of my head, to channel in couple billion usd. To make things be on par with Y2D top tvl gainers. Money always sticks to good hand ready to spend it on cool things. For example my objective is to finance my fancies, afford me things I crave while the source for that wealth to make it happen can be anything. If it is sponsoring a coin project to jump from 1000 to 10 CMC I am always in if it nets me returns in my future.
